description.p: A gift from the once Queen of I'Cath, you know the spell Conjure Ammunition. While you hold the dream stone, you may cast this spell a number of times equal to your proficiency modifier, even if you’re not in the dream world or in a region connected to the dream world. This spell doesn’t count against the spells you know and is always prepared.
As thanks for curing Sylas, you have resistance to Cold Damage and the effects of Cold Weather.
